instructions.step: Mix together the mince, yellow mustard andÂ 1 finely chopped pickled cucumber, season and shape into 4 burgers, then chill for 10 minutes.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the burgers for 10-12 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked throughout with no pink meat.
Top each with a slice of Monterey Jack. Place in the burgers with the tomatoes and remaining pickled cucumbers, serve with salad and extra yellow mustard.
